item.description:
Lively dining & entertainment creates an impressive Moroccan experience. Belly dancers perform while we dine & for adventurous ones, hooka is available.

Tangierino Web Page

PARKING: NAUTICA GARAGE 88 Constitution Plaza Charlestown, MA 02129 (617) 337-0068
Create your own train &/or bus route @ mbta.com or www.hopstop.com

We MUST order from Tangierino's prix fixe menus

$69 Prix Fixe Tangier Menu

Choice of
1) harira-Authentic
soup of plum tomato base, chickpeas, lentils, cilantro
2) mendoubia salad-Authentic
goat cheese, baby spinach, shaved parmesan, toasted pine nuts, aged balsamic vinaigrette
3) chicken b'stila-Authentic
delicate domed phyllo pie of chicken, toasted almonds, mint yogurt sauce
4) Sahara shrimp-Contemporary
tagine style of jumbo shrimp drenched in spicy charmoula sauce, herbed-grilled crostini
5) (4) layers tuna tartar-Contemporary
layers of spicy yellow fin tuna, honey mango, avocado-guacamole, cilantro- cucumber

Choice of
1) tagine of wild salmon-Authentic
pan roasted salmon filet, root vegetables, fingerling potatoes, grape tomatoes, bell peppers, Mediterranean olives, plum tomato sauce
2) (7) vegetable cous cous-Authentic
cous cous medley of braised butter-nut squash, baby turnips, cabbage, carrots, chickpeas
3) tagine of lemony chicken-Authentic
grilled chicken breast, rubbed in herbs and lemon, green olives, shallots, pomme frites
4) sultan's kadra-Authentic
za'atar spiced tender filet of lamb, cheese filled eggplant, shitake mushroom, poached figs, caramelized apricot, rosemary reduction
5) moroccan-style duck-Contemporary
pan-crisped duck breast, confit of duck, dried cherry, pineapple, truffle oil mashed potato, toa, cilantro- cucumber sted almonds, and cherry glaze

Choice of
1) molten flourless chocolate soufflé 2) exotic sorbet choices of lemon 3) watermelon and tangerine
OR
$89 Prix Fixe Marrakech Menu

First Course
1) harira-Authentic
soup of plum tomato base, chickpeas, lentils, cilantro
2) mendoubia salad-Authentic
goat cheese, baby spinach, shaved parmesan, toasted pine nuts, aged balsamic vinaigrette

Second Course
1) Sahara shrimp-Contemporary
tagine style of jumbo shrimp drenched in spicy charmoula sauce, herbed-grilled crostini
2) (4 ) layers tuna tartar-Contemporary
layers of spicy yellow fin, scallion cucumber, honey mango, avocado-guacamole

Main Entrée
1) (7) vegetable cous cous-Authentic
cous cous medley of braised butter-nut squash, baby turnips, cabbage, carrots, chickpeas
2) tagine of lemony chicken-Authentic
grilled chicken breast, rubbed in herbs and lemon, green olives, shallots, pomme frites
3) sultan's kadra-Authentic
za'atar spiced tender filet of lamb, cheese filled eggplant, shitake mushroom, poached figs, caramelized apricot, rosemary reduction
4) Sashimi kissed tuna-Contemporary
poppy seed crusted yellow fin tuna, harissa crab cake, avocado-mango salad, and pineapple teriyaki reduction
5) Moroccan-style duck-Contemporary
pan-crisped duck breast, comfit of duck, dried cherry, pineapple, truffle oil meshed potato, toasted almonds, and cherry glaze

Dessert 3 Choices from menu

Complimentary coffee or Moroccan tea

Rules for Engagement:

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.
Please bring enough cash to pay for your expenses, which include tip & tax.
Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.
If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.
If this event is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be wait listed.
If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it will count as if you NO-SHOWED for THREE (3) events.
If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied by final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as if you NO-SHOWED for THREE (3) events.
If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it will count as if you NO-SHOWED for THREE (3) events.
If you are a NO-SHOW for THREE (3) events you are removed from the group.
NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.
If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must call or text me at 617 445-7549.
An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.
If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me about rejoining.
Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.
item.why: Exotic adventure into a Charlestown Casbah which is much cheaper than a trip to Morroco

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Tangierino Moroccan Dinner
